testCases.name: Functional Application Test
testCases.description: Verify the application has actual functionality beyond basic placeholder
steps: Verify multiple interactive elements exist (buttons, forms, links)
Check for proper navigation structure with working links
Verify application has real features like product listings, categories, search
Check that the page is not just showing 'Vite + React' placeholder text
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application shows functional construction marketplace with products, categories, and interactive features
testCases.failureCondition: If page only shows 'Vite + React' placeholder or has no real functionality, this test should FAIL

testCases.name: Homepage Loads Successfully
testCases.description: Verify homepage loads without errors and displays main content
steps: Wait for page to fully load
Verify no JavaScript errors in console
Check that main navigation is visible
Verify hero section or featured content displays
testCases.expectedOutcome: Homepage loads successfully with navigation, hero section, and featured content visible
testCases.failureCondition: Page fails to load, shows error message, or has blank content

testCases.name: Navigation Structure Test
testCases.description: Test that main navigation exists and is functional
steps: Verify all expected menu items are present (Products, Categories, Suppliers, etc.)
Verify each link navigates to correct page
testCases.expectedOutcome: Navigation bar contains all main sections and links work correctly
testCases.failureCondition: Navigation missing, links broken, or navigation doesn't respond to clicks

testCases.name: Product Catalog Display
testCases.description: Verify product catalog displays products correctly
steps: Navigate to products page or search results
Check that product cards show: image, name, price, supplier
Verify at least 5 products are visible
testCases.expectedOutcome: Product catalog displays with multiple products showing images, names, prices, and supplier information
testCases.failureCondition: No products display, product cards are broken, or essential information is missing

testCases.name: Product Detail Page Functionality
testCases.description: Test product detail page displays complete product information
steps: Navigate to a specific product detail page
Check product name, price, description are visible
Look for product specifications and details
testCases.expectedOutcome: Product detail page shows complete product information including images, pricing, specifications, and purchase options
testCases.failureCondition: Page fails to load, missing critical information, or 'Add to Cart' functionality absent

testCases.name: Search Functionality Test
testCases.description: Test that search feature works and returns relevant results
steps: Check that results are relevant to search query
testCases.expectedOutcome: Search returns relevant products matching the query with result count displayed
testCases.failureCondition: Search doesn't work, returns no results, or shows irrelevant products

testCases.name: Category Browsing
testCases.description: Test browsing products by category
steps: Navigate to categories page or menu
Verify category page loads with products
Check that products match selected category
testCases.expectedOutcome: Categories are listed, clicking a category shows relevant products filtered by that category
testCases.failureCondition: Categories don't display, navigation broken, or products don't match category

testCases.name: Login Page Display
testCases.description: Verify login page displays correctly
testCases.expectedOutcome: Login page displays with form fields, login button, and links to registration and password reset
testCases.failureCondition: Form missing, fields not interactive, or essential links absent

testCases.name: Customer Login Flow
testCases.description: Test successful login for customer user
steps: Verify redirect to dashboard or homepage
Check that user is authenticated (profile menu visible)
testCases.expectedOutcome: User logs in successfully and is redirected to appropriate page with authenticated state
testCases.failureCondition: Login fails, error message appears, or user remains unauthenticated

testCases.name: Supplier Login Flow
testCases.description: Test successful login for supplier user
steps: Check that supplier-specific features are available
testCases.expectedOutcome: Supplier logs in successfully and sees supplier-specific interface
testCases.failureCondition: Login fails or supplier is not directed to supplier dashboard

testCases.name: Admin Login Flow
testCases.description: Test successful login for admin user
testCases.expectedOutcome: Admin logs in successfully and has access to admin features
testCases.failureCondition: Login fails or admin doesn't have access to admin dashboard

testCases.name: Registration Page Display
testCases.description: Verify registration page displays correctly
steps: Check for required fields: name, email, password, phone
Check for account type selection if applicable
Check for link back to login
testCases.expectedOutcome: Registration page displays with all required form fields and submit button
testCases.failureCondition: Form missing, required fields absent, or form not interactive

testCases.name: Invalid Login Attempt
testCases.description: Test that invalid credentials are rejected
steps: Check that user is not authenticated
testCases.expectedOutcome: Login fails with appropriate error message, user remains unauthenticated
testCases.failureCondition: Invalid credentials are accepted or no error message shown

testCases.name: Logout Functionality
testCases.description: Test that users can log out successfully
steps: Locate logout button (usually in profile menu)
Verify redirect to homepage or login page
Check that authenticated state is cleared
Try accessing protected route - should redirect to login
testCases.expectedOutcome: User logs out successfully, session is cleared, and protected routes are inaccessible
testCases.failureCondition: Logout doesn't work, user remains authenticated, or session persists

testCases.name: Add Product to Cart
testCases.description: Test adding a product to shopping cart
steps: Navigate to a product detail page
Check that cart icon updates with item count
testCases.expectedOutcome: Product is added to cart, cart count updates, and product appears in cart page
testCases.failureCondition: Product not added, no confirmation, or cart doesn't update

testCases.name: Shopping Cart Page Display
testCases.description: Verify shopping cart page displays correctly
steps: Check that each item shows: image, name, price, quantity
testCases.expectedOutcome: Cart page displays all items with details, pricing, and checkout option
testCases.failureCondition: Cart page empty when items added, pricing incorrect, or checkout button missing

testCases.name: Update Cart Item Quantity
testCases.description: Test updating quantity of items in cart
steps: Locate quantity selector for an item
Click update or wait for auto-update
testCases.expectedOutcome: Quantity updates successfully and pricing recalculates
testCases.failureCondition: Quantity doesn't update, pricing incorrect, or update fails

testCases.name: Remove Item from Cart
testCases.description: Test removing an item from shopping cart
steps: Locate remove button for an item
Verify item is removed from cart
testCases.expectedOutcome: Item is removed from cart and totals recalculate
testCases.failureCondition: Item not removed, cart errors, or totals incorrect

testCases.name: Checkout Page Access
testCases.description: Test accessing checkout page
testCases.expectedOutcome: Checkout page loads with form and order summary
testCases.failureCondition: Cannot access checkout, page errors, or form not displayed

testCases.name: Guest Checkout Option
testCases.description: Test that guest checkout is available
steps: Check that email field is available for guest
testCases.expectedOutcome: Guest checkout is available with email and address forms
testCases.failureCondition: Guest checkout not available or form incomplete

testCases.name: Supplier Shop Page
testCases.description: Test viewing a supplier's shop page
steps: Navigate to a supplier shop page
Check that supplier products are listed
testCases.expectedOutcome: Supplier shop page displays with products, ratings, and information
testCases.failureCondition: Page doesn't load, products missing, or essential information absent

testCases.name: Product Reviews Display
testCases.description: Test that product reviews display correctly
steps: Check that each review shows: rating, reviewer name, date, text
Check for 'Write a Review' option if authenticated
testCases.expectedOutcome: Reviews section displays with ratings, reviewer info, and review text
testCases.failureCondition: Reviews don't display, information missing, or section broken

testCases.name: Password Reset Request
testCases.description: Test requesting a password reset
testCases.expectedOutcome: Password reset request is submitted and confirmation message shown
testCases.failureCondition: Form doesn't work, no confirmation, or page errors

testCases.name: Responsive Mobile View
testCases.description: Test that site is responsive on mobile devices
steps: Resize browser to mobile dimensions (375px width)
Check that navigation collapses to hamburger menu
Verify content is readable and not cut off
Test key interactions work on mobile
testCases.expectedOutcome: Site displays correctly on mobile with responsive layout and functional mobile menu
testCases.failureCondition: Layout breaks, content overflow, or menu doesn't work

testCases.name: Footer Links Functionality
testCases.description: Test that footer links are present and functional
steps: Check for links to: About, Contact, Terms, Privacy, Help
Verify links navigate to correct pages
testCases.expectedOutcome: Footer displays with all important links that navigate correctly
testCases.failureCondition: Footer missing, links broken, or pages don't load

testCases.name: About Page Content Quality
testCases.description: Verify About page has meaningful content
steps: Verify content is more than placeholder text
Look for mission statement or company description
testCases.expectedOutcome: About page displays with actual company information and meaningful content
testCases.failureCondition: Page is placeholder, has lorem ipsum, or minimal content

testCases.name: Contact Page Form
testCases.description: Test contact form on contact page
steps: Check for fields: name, email, subject, message
Fill out form with test data
testCases.expectedOutcome: Contact form displays and submits successfully with confirmation
testCases.failureCondition: Form missing, fields not working, or submission fails

testCases.name: Help Center Pages
testCases.description: Verify help center has useful content
steps: Check for FAQ or help topics
Check for search functionality if available
testCases.expectedOutcome: Help center displays with organized topics and helpful content
testCases.failureCondition: Help center empty, no topics, or content missing

testCases.name: Terms of Service Page
testCases.description: Verify terms of service page exists and has content
steps: Check that legal content is present
Verify content is more than placeholder
Check for proper formatting and readability
testCases.expectedOutcome: Terms of service page displays with actual legal content
testCases.failureCondition: Page missing, placeholder content, or unformatted text

testCases.name: Privacy Policy Page
testCases.description: Verify privacy policy page exists and has content
steps: Check that privacy policy content is present
Verify content covers data collection and usage
testCases.expectedOutcome: Privacy policy page displays with actual privacy information
testCases.failureCondition: Page missing, placeholder content, or incomplete policy

testCases.name: How It Works Page
testCases.description: Verify How It Works page explains platform features
steps: Verify visual elements (icons, images) if present
Check that content explains platform purpose and process
testCases.expectedOutcome: How It Works page displays clear explanation of platform features and process
testCases.failureCondition: Page missing, unclear content, or just placeholder text

testCases.name: Become a Supplier Page
testCases.description: Verify supplier application page exists
steps: Check for application form or information
testCases.expectedOutcome: Become a Supplier page displays with application info and form
testCases.failureCondition: Page missing, no application form, or incomplete information

testCases.name: Product Filtering
testCases.description: Test product filtering functionality
steps: Navigate to products or search results page
Apply a filter (e.g., price range, category, rating)
Verify results update to match filter
Clear filters and verify all products return
testCases.expectedOutcome: Filters work correctly and update product results appropriately
testCases.failureCondition: Filters don't work, results don't update, or filters cause errors

testCases.name: Product Sorting
testCases.description: Test product sorting functionality
steps: Test other sort options: 'Price: High to Low', 'Rating', 'Newest'
Verify each sort option works correctly
testCases.expectedOutcome: Sorting options work and products reorder according to selected criteria
testCases.failureCondition: Sorting doesn't work, order incorrect, or options missing

testCases.name: Product Pagination
testCases.description: Test pagination on product listing pages
steps: Navigate to products page with multiple pages
Verify page updates and new products load
testCases.expectedOutcome: Pagination works correctly allowing navigation through product pages
testCases.failureCondition: Pagination broken, pages don't change, or navigation fails

testCases.name: Product Image Loading
testCases.description: Verify product images load correctly
steps: Verify images are not broken (no broken image icons)
Click on a product to view detail
Verify larger images load on detail page
testCases.expectedOutcome: All product images load correctly without broken links
testCases.failureCondition: Images don't load, broken image icons, or missing images

testCases.name: 404 Error Page
testCases.description: Test that 404 page handles invalid URLs
steps: Verify link back to homepage exists
Click homepage link and verify it works
testCases.expectedOutcome: 404 page displays with helpful message and navigation back to site
testCases.failureCondition: Blank page, unhelpful error, or no way to navigate back

testCases.name: Protected Route Redirect
testCases.description: Test that unauthenticated users are redirected from protected routes
steps: Check that return URL is preserved
Verify redirect back to originally requested page
testCases.expectedOutcome: Unauthenticated users redirected to login, then back to intended page after login
testCases.failureCondition: Protected routes accessible without auth, no redirect, or return URL lost

testCases.name: Customer Dashboard Access
testCases.description: Test customer can access their dashboard after login
steps: Verify navigation to account sections (orders, wishlist, profile)
testCases.expectedOutcome: Customer dashboard displays with orders, account info, and navigation options
testCases.failureCondition: Dashboard doesn't load, missing sections, or navigation broken

testCases.name: Supplier Dashboard Access
testCases.description: Test supplier can access their dashboard
testCases.expectedOutcome: Supplier dashboard displays with product management, orders, and analytics
testCases.failureCondition: Dashboard doesn't load, missing supplier features, or access denied

testCases.name: Admin Dashboard Access
testCases.description: Test admin can access admin dashboard
testCases.expectedOutcome: Admin dashboard displays with platform management tools and statistics
testCases.failureCondition: Dashboard doesn't load, missing admin features, or access denied

testCases.name: Complete Purchase Flow
testCases.description: Test complete end-to-end purchase flow
steps: Check order appears in order history
testCases.expectedOutcome: Complete purchase flow works from product selection to order confirmation
testCases.failureCondition: Any step fails, checkout incomplete, or order not recorded

testCases.name: Wishlist Functionality
testCases.description: Test adding products to wishlist
testCases.expectedOutcome: Products can be added to and removed from wishlist
testCases.failureCondition: Wishlist feature doesn't work, items not saved, or page errors

testCases.name: Real-time Features Test
testCases.description: Test if any real-time features are functional
steps: Check for notification bell or indicator
Look for real-time order status updates
testCases.expectedOutcome: Real-time features like notifications or messaging work if implemented
testCases.failureCondition: Real-time features don't work or WebSocket connection fails

testCases.name: Page Load Performance
testCases.description: Test that pages load within acceptable time
steps: Verify all pages load within 3 seconds
testCases.expectedOutcome: All pages load within 3 seconds on reasonable connection
testCases.failureCondition: Pages take longer than 5 seconds to load or timeout

testCases.name: Basic Accessibility Check
testCases.description: Test basic accessibility features
steps: Check that images have alt text
Verify form labels are properly associated
Test with screen reader if available
testCases.expectedOutcome: Basic accessibility features work including keyboard navigation and proper labeling
testCases.failureCondition: Keyboard navigation broken, missing labels, or poor accessibility

test_execution_notes.browser_testing: Test in Chrome, Firefox, and Safari if possible
test_execution_notes.mobile_testing: Test responsive design on mobile viewport
test_execution_notes.authentication_testing: Test all three user roles: customer, supplier, admin
